title: Coca-Cola on its plans to grow in the alcoholic ready-to-drink market - Marketing Week
summary: The Coca-Cola Company is exploring opportunities in the alcoholic ready-to-drink market through a new partnership with Jack Daniel's. The official launch of RTD cans is set for release across the UK this month, emphasizing consumer-centricity in their strategy. According to Javier Meza, this product aims to simplify the enjoyment of a popular drink combination.

title: The Sustainable Fashion Revolution: Transforming the Textile Industry - Indian Retailer
summary: The article provides an overview of the top luxury watch brands in India, highlighting their history, innovations, and unique features. It discusses brands like Rolex, Franck Muller, Omega, and others, emphasizing their craftsmanship, design, and market presence. The article also offers tips for selecting the right watch brand based on style, functionality, and reputation.

title: Baskin Robbins Revamps Brand Identity - Indian Retailer
summary: HanesBrands has reached an agreement to sell its Champion business to Authentic Brands Group for up to $1.5 billion. The deal is part of HanesBrands' strategy to focus on its innerwear category and enhance its financial performance. The company plans to use the proceeds to accelerate debt reduction and simplify operations. The transaction is expected to be completed in the second half of 2024.

title: High-end Online Shopping to Drive Retail Contribution to Nation's Economy - Indian Retailer
summary: The article discusses how D2C brands in India are ramping up their offerings and supply chain in preparation for the festive season, highlighting specific products, technological advancements, and sales targets. Brands like Solethreads, Zouk, IGP, and The Tribe Concepts are focusing on sustainability, inventory expansion, and automation to cater to increased consumer demand. The festive season provides a backdrop for innovative product launches and expanded delivery capabilities among these brands, as they adapt to changing consumer behavior post-pandemic.
green_innovation: TRUE - The article mentions that Solethreads provides sustainable and recycled footwear and has implemented a 'reuse program' to promote upcycling and circular fashion.
business_innovation: TRUE - The article discusses D2C brands introducing new and improved product offerings and processes, showcasing strategies that differ significantly from their previous offerings.
green_product: TRUE - Solethreads' sustainable and recycled footwear aligns with the definition of a green product by significantly reducing environmental impact throughout its life cycle.
green_process: TRUE - The reuse program mentioned in the article demonstrates a green process aimed at minimizing environmental impacts by encouraging upcycling.

title: Top 10 Best Consumer Products Companies In USA 2023 - Inventiva
summary: In 2023, consumer products companies in the U.S. are set for growth as digital-savvy consumers have increased access to a wide range of goods and services. Key players like Apple, Amazon, and Microsoft focus on innovative and sustainable practices to stay competitive while catering to consumer demand. To thrive, companies must invest in advanced digital infrastructures and prioritize sustainability in their product offerings. The landscape continues to evolve as consumers look for high-quality, eco-friendly options in their purchases.
